descriptions: Student is unable to count beyond 100 or makes frequent errors.
Student can count to 300 with some errors.
Student can count to 500 with occasional errors.
Student can accurately count to 700 with minimal errors.
Student can accurately count to 1000, but may hesitate or make a few corrections.
Student can fluently and accurately count to 1000 without any errors.
Student cannot skip-count by 2s or makes significant errors.
Student can skip-count by 2s up to 20 with many errors.
Student can skip-count by 2s up to 50 with some errors.
Student can skip-count by 2s up to 100 with minor errors.
Student can accurately skip-count by 2s beyond 100, but hesitates or makes a few corrections.
Student can fluently and accurately skip-count by 2s to a high number without any errors.
Student cannot skip-count by 5s or makes significant errors.
Student can skip-count by 5s up to 50 with many errors.
Student can skip-count by 5s up to 100 with some errors.
Student can skip-count by 5s up to 200 with minor errors.
Student can accurately skip-count by 5s beyond 200, but hesitates or makes a few corrections.
Student can fluently and accurately skip-count by 5s to a high number without any errors.
Student cannot skip-count by 10s or makes significant errors.
Student can skip-count by 10s up to 100 with many errors.
Student can skip-count by 10s up to 200 with some errors.
Student can skip-count by 10s up to 500 with minor errors.
Student can accurately skip-count by 10s beyond 500, but hesitates or makes a few corrections.
Student can fluently and accurately skip-count by 10s to a high number without any errors.
Student cannot skip-count by 100s or makes significant errors.
Student can skip-count by 100s up to 300 with many errors.
Student can skip-count by 100s up to 500 with some errors.
Student can skip-count by 100s up to 800 with minor errors.
Student can accurately skip-count by 100s to 1000, but hesitates or makes a few corrections.
Student can fluently and accurately skip-count by 100s to 1000 and beyond without any errors.
